section1.bio: Hello! My name is Nicholas Wease. I am a Front End Software Developer. I am very passionate and dedicated to my work. With 3 years experience as a Front End Software Developer, I continue to learn and acquire the skills and knowledge necessary to make your project a success. I am thrilled with every step of the development process, from discussion and collaboration to concept and execution, but I find the most satisfaction in seeing the finished product do everything for you that it was created to do.
